gitlet

Class Gitlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gitlet.Gitlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Gitlet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for Gitlet objects. Keeps track of Commits, staged changes, branches, and information in the .gitlet, .gitlet/staged/, and .gitlet/commits/ directories.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gitlet()
      Creates a new gitlet object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Commit> getBranches()
      Returns the HashMap "branches" associated with the current Gitlet object.
      java.util.ArrayList<Commit> getCommits()
      Returns the list of Commits associated with the current Gitlet object.
      java.lang.String getHEAD()
      Returns the String name of the current branch associated with the current Gitlet object.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getStagingArea()
      Returns the staging area associated with the current Gitlet object; the staging area maps file names to file ID's (SHA1 values of files).
      void resetStagingArea()
      Allows the user to set a new staging area for the current Gitlet object (used to clear the staging area at the end of each Commit)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gitlet

        public Gitlet()
        Creates a new gitlet object. Initialises a .gitlet directory with /staged and /commits sub directories. Initialises the stagingArea and branches vars to empty HashMaps Creates a new branch "master" and sets HEAD = "master". Also adds "master" to this.branches and associated it with an initial Commit If a gitlet object already exists (ie. fails to create new .gitlet directory), an error is printed and the System exits.

    • Method Detail

      • getBranches

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Commit> getBranches()
        Returns the HashMap "branches" associated with the current Gitlet object.
        Returns:
        the branches HashMap of the current Gitlet object

      • getCommits

        public java.util.ArrayList<Commit> getCommits()
        Returns the list of Commits associated with the current Gitlet object.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Commits

      • getHEAD

        public java.lang.String getHEAD()
        Returns the String name of the current branch associated with the current Gitlet object.
        Returns:
        the current working branch

      • getStagingArea

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getStagingArea()
        Returns the staging area associated with the current Gitlet object; the staging area maps file names to file ID's (SHA1 values of files). These SHA1 values depend on the file context and change when files are modified.
        Returns:
        the HashMap describing the staging area (FileName > FileID)

      • resetStagingArea

        public void resetStagingArea()
        Allows the user to set a new staging area for the current Gitlet object (used to clear the staging area at the end of each Commit)
